trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the name of the associated property is displayed with parentheses in the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 指示关联属性的名称在“属性”窗口中显示时是否带有括号。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute> with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute.NeedParenthesis%2A> value of `true` indicates to the Properties window that the associated property should be displayed with parentheses around its name.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute>与<xref:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute.NeedParenthesis%2A>值`true`指示属性窗口关联的属性，应显示用圆括号括其名称。

trans-unit.source: The Properties window displays a property with parentheses around its name near the top of the list in alphabetical mode, or near the top of its category if the Properties window is in categorize mode.
trans-unit.target: 属性窗口中按字母顺序排列的模式下，显示带有列表的顶部附近，其名称两边的括号的属性或其类别顶部附近属性窗口是否处于分类模式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute" /> class that indicates that the associated property should not be shown with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute" /> 类的新实例，该实例指示关联属性显示时不应带括号。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute" /> class that indicates that the associated property should not be shown with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute" /> 类的新实例，该实例指示关联属性显示时不应带括号。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the name should be enclosed in parentheses; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称应括在括号中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute" /> class, using the specified value to indicate whether the attribute is displayed with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定值来指示该特性显示时是否带有括号，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute" /> class with a default value that indicates that the associated property should not be shown with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 用默认值（该值指示关联的属性显示时不应带有括号）初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified object to this object and tests for equality.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象与此对象进行比较并测试是否相等。
如果相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for this object.
trans-unit.target: 获取此对象的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the object the attribute belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 该特性所属对象的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示该特性的当前值是否为该特性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current value of the attribute is the default value of the attribute; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果特性的当前值为该特性的默认值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the Properties window displays the name of the property in parentheses in the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在“属性”窗口中显示属性的名称时是否带有括号。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property is displayed with parentheses; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性显示时带有括号，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
